ValidationRule.description: Cannot validate client profile task if household status is still 'validations outstanding'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Validate_Client_Profile_Updates", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed"), OR( ISPICKVAL(FinServ__Household__r.Profile_Status__c,"Updated by Client (Validations Outstanding)"), ISPICKVAL(FinServ__Household__r.Profile_Status__c,"Completed by Client (Validations Outstanding)") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to update the Profile Status to either Up-to-date or Update Required
